title: Resolve memorializing the Massachusetts Delegation, and the United States Congress, on the need for, and support of Syrian War Crimes Procedures

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Lewis (by request), a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 2474) of Vincent Dixon,  for legislation to memorialize the Massachusetts Delegation, and the United States Congress, on the need for, and support of Syrian War Crimes Procedures.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

related_entities.name: committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Hearing rescheduled to 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-03:50 PM in B-1                                             and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Accompanied a study order, see S2784
